snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 2,274 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.
abstract: Defense Department confirms death of one American service member as part of Afghan war and related operations.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 2,274 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.
